question: Ransomware Task Force, which was making news recently, has been launched by which major tech company?
explanation:
Leading Tech company Microsoft along with other tech companies, security firms and non-profits have launched a new group, called the ‘Ransomware Task Force’ (RTF).
The task force, which also includes McAfee, will assess technical solutions to provide protections during a ransomware attack. It will create a comprehensive solution to work together across industries, to tackle ransomware.
